titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 12-Hydroxyoctadecanoic acid, Reaction Product with N,N-Dimethyl, 1,3-Propanediamine, Dimethyl Sulfate, Quarternized.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 12-Hydroxyoctadecanoic acid, Reaction Product with N,N-Dimethyl, 1,3-Propanediamine, Dimethyl Sulfate, Quarternized.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 12-Hydroxyoctadecanoic acid, Reaction Product with N,N-Dimethyl, 1,3-Propanediamine, Dimethyl Sulfate, Quarternized.
